name: Okia
description:
2D side-scrolling platform game. Levels are procedurally generated. Enemies are randomly selected and procedurally placed.

Run, jump and shoot your way to the end of the level, watch out for the enemies, their behavior varies. See if you can make it to the end of the level. Each playthrough is different!

Obvious homages to Limbo and Sonic the Hedgehog.

This is an early version so expect some glitches, I appreciate any feedback. Made using Unity2D.

Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Player Left
Right Arrow - Move Player Right
Down Arrow - Crouch
Space Bar - Jump
X Button - Shoot
K Button - Self Destruct
P Button - Pause/Resume Game
